00020 Queue::Queue() : front(0), back(MAX_QUEUE-1), count(0)
00021 {
00022 }  // end default constructor
00023 
00024 bool Queue::isEmpty() const
00025 {
00026    return count == 0;
00027 }  // end isEmpty
00028 
00029 bool Queue::isFull() const
00030 {
00031    return count == MAX_QUEUE;
00032 }  // end isEmpty
00033 
00034 void Queue::enqueue(const QueueItemType& newItem)
00035    throw(QueueException)
00036 {
00037    if (count == MAX_QUEUE)
00038       throw QueueException(
00039         "QueueException: queue full on enqueue");
00040    else
00041    {  // queue is not full; insert item
00042       back = (back + 1) % MAX_QUEUE;
00043       items[back] = newItem;
00044       ++count;
00045    }  // end if
00046 }  // end enqueue
00047 
00048 void Queue::dequeue() throw(QueueException)
00049 {
00050    if (isEmpty())
00051       throw QueueException(
00052         "QueueException: empty queue, cannot dequeue");
00053    else
00054    {  // queue is not empty; remove front
00055       front = (front + 1) % MAX_QUEUE;
00056       --count; // delete front
00057    }  // end if
00058 }  // end dequeue
00059 
00060 void Queue::dequeue(QueueItemType& queueFront)
00061    throw(QueueException)
00062 {
00063    if (isEmpty())
00064       throw QueueException(
00065         "QueueException: empty queue, cannot dequeue");
00066    else
00067    {  // queue is not empty; retrieve and remove front
00068       queueFront = items[front];
00069       front = (front + 1) % MAX_QUEUE;
00070       --count; // delete front
00071    }  // end if
00072 }  // end dequeue
00073 
00074 void Queue::getFront(QueueItemType& queueFront) const
00075    throw(QueueException)
00076 {
00077    if (isEmpty())
00078       throw QueueException(
00079         "QueueException: empty queue, cannot getFront");
00080    else
00081       // queue is not empty; retrieve front
00082       queueFront = items[front];
00083 }  // end getFront
00084 
00085 size_t Queue::getSize() const
00086 {
00087    return MAX_QUEUE;
00088 }  // end getSize
00089 
00090 size_t Queue::getCount() const
00091 {
00092    return count;
00093 }  // end getCount
00094 
00095 size_t Queue::getVacancies() const
00096 {
00097    // return (MAX_QUEUE - count); // correct expression
00098    return (count - MAX_QUEUE); // incorrect expression
00099 }  // end getVacancies
